title: The 7 Biggest Questions of the 2022 NBA Finals | Group Chat
description:
Justin, Rob, and Wos discuss the seven biggest questions for the Celtics and Warriors ahead of Game 1 of the NBA Finals.

Hosts: Justin Verrier, Rob Mahoney, Wosny Lambre
Associate Producer: Isaiah Blakely
Additional Production Supervision: Benjamin Cruz
